'''Heartstring Noodles''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Dragon Beard Noodles]] with [[Shenhe]].  The recipe for Dragon Beard Noodles is obtainable from [[Chef Mao]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Heartstring Noodles increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s.
